name: SlowRez
description:
Slow Rez is a die and retry game. Jump your way through 20 levels, fight monsters with your sword and bow! Also featuring: a time slowing mode so you can easily shoot down fast enemies!

This is my entry for the LOWREZJAM2017, made in about 8 days, and one of my first actually playable game, so it is probably rough around the edges. I hope you'll have fun anyway!

Controls: (Gamepad recommended)

Mouse+keyboard

wasd: move, Right click: aim, Left click: attack/fire arrow, Space: jump, R: run, Esc: cancel

Credits:

  • Made with Unity. Code and Sprites by myself (sprvrn).
  •  Font by Daniel Linssen: m5x7 and m3x6.
  • Sound: 8-bit Platformer SFX commissioned by Mark McCorkle for OpenGameArt.org ( http://opengameart.org ) (CC BY 3.0)
